definition.text: The Web Server has two main goals: it serves all the JS files that form the Web App and all the data files to be plotted at the charts to the browser that is running the UI.

paragraphs.text: The complete list Web Server uses is:
JS Files: Enables the Web App to run on a browser.
JSON Data Files: Allows the UI to access data to plot.
Images: Images used on the UI are served from the Web Server.
JSON Workspaces Files: Allow users to create definitions on different Workspaces.
JSON Plugin Files: Files that are automatically included on Workspaces for convenience.
